name: Zealth
headline: Software for remote monitoring of cancer patients
description:
Zealth is building remote monitoring software to help hospitals provide automated continuous round-the-clock support to their cancer patients post-discharge. 

Hospitals are overburdened with no resources to provide care to their chronic patients once they leave the hospital. For instance, in India, there are only 2200 oncologists for 1.38 billion people. Patients travel 100 miles waiting for hours to get few minutes with the doctors. They have no easy means to manage all the toxicities and symptoms they get once they are back home. This leads to 6X lower patient retention, 4X high emergency readmissions, and poor patient outcomes. 

Zealth bridges this gap through its digital health intervention platform.

founders.name: Monika Mehta, Founder
founders.description:
Ph.D. Immunology, NUS, Singapore
Clinical Research Fellow, SingHealth, Singapore
Senior Scientist, Chugai Pharma (Roche group), Singapore

founders.name: Dheeraj Mundhra, Founder
founders.description:
Building Zealth - Software for remote monitoring of cancer patients.
Graduated from IIT Kharagpur, Built multiple AI based products in finance and healthcare in the last 7 years.

## End to End Remote monitoring for cancer patients 
[ ](https://zealth-ai.com/<#next>)
## We understand you well
When I saw my close family member going through cancer (which is undoubtedly one of the most complicated diseases that ever existed in humanity), I realized a big gap in healthcare. The patient had to go through multiple toxic chemos followed by radio and eventually surgery. The entire two years were just full of confusion. Whether to call up the doctor, looking up for information on the internet, what do these tests mean, what do these symptoms mean, am I getting better or getting worse?!? There were just too many unanswered questions with no easy solution. Even though we were lucky to have access to some of the best doctors in the country, they were still so overburdened with limited resources to provide continuous round-the-clock care at home. That was the moment when I realized that something needs to be changed. – [ Monika Mehta ](https://zealth-ai.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/monika-mehta-phd/>), Ph.D., CEO We then came up with an end-to-end solution that provides real-time health monitoring and insights using machine learning for easy management of the disease at home. It not only helps patients and empowers them with all the correct information at the right time but also reduces the burdens from their doctors. – [ Dheeraj Mundhra ](https://zealth-ai.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/dmundhra/>) , CTO. 
###  Patients 
Manage your symptoms while at home and get real time alerts when to contact your doctor 
[More ](https://zealth-ai.com/<https:/zealth-ai.com/patients/>)
###  Doctor 
Save time and get actionable insights personalized for each patients 
[More ](https://zealth-ai.com/<https:/zealth-ai.com/clinicians/>)
###  Insurer 
Reduce claims with proactive timely interventions 
[More ](https://zealth-ai.com/<https:/zealth-ai.com/insurance/>)
###  Clinical Trials 
Real world evidence for faster and cost effective clinical trial 
[More ](https://zealth-ai.com/<https:/zealth-ai.com/clinical-trials/>)
## Testimonials
## Patient
I have been tracking my mother-in-law’s symptoms since her treatments began. Careshare is a very useful app for me as it has helped me with keeping a track of her and I am very thankful for it as it has made monitoring so much more easier. 
MaheshCaregiver of Stomach Cancer Patient
I got instant answers to my burning questions because of Careshare. I didn't have to wait for hours to call hospitals. Their 24X7 support is amazing. 
AdityaLung Cancer Patient
Careshare gave me peace of mind. We felt connected to the doctor all the time. I used to get instant replies from the doctor for all my questions. 
SwatiCaregiver of Oral Cancer Patient
It was the 3rd day of using Careshare. My brother was alerted as high risk due to high ever severe vomiting. The hospital got an immediate alert and they informed us to take a Complete Blood Count. Careshare helped in saving my brother’s life. 
MohanCaregiver of Blood Cancer patient
Previous
Next
## Doctor
CareShare has made patient follow up simple and effective. It has significantly increased patient engagement. 
Dr. Aarti Sinha
CareShare helped me get a 360 degree view of the patients health and status while at home. It has made monitoring the patient’s health very easy. 
Dr. Pawan Singh
Previous
Next

generated_description:
### Zealth: Transforming Cancer Patient Monitoring

**Overview**  
Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, Zealth operates out of Bengaluru, India, with a nimble team of just two employees. Its mission? To provide software for the remote monitoring of cancer patients, making post-hospital care more accessible and effective.

**The Need**  
The statistics are stark: In India, with a staggering population of 1.38 billion, there are only 2,200 oncologists available. Patients often journey over 100 miles to secure mere minutes of a doctor's time, leading to 6 times lower patient retention and 4 times higher emergency readmissions. The post-treatment phase for cancer patients is chaotic—symptoms and toxicities abound, often leaving patients in confusion without accessible help.

**The Solution**  
Zealth's platform aims to bridge this gap. By leveraging machine learning, it offers an end-to-end solution for real-time health monitoring and symptom management for cancer patients at home. The software alerts patients when it's time to reach out to their doctors and provides actionable insights tailored for clinicians. This not only enhances patient engagement but significantly lightens the load on healthcare providers, allowing them to focus on what they do best—care for their patients.

**What They Do**  
1. **Patients**: Empower them to track symptoms and receive real-time alerts.
2. **Clinicians**: Provide a 360-degree view of their patients' statuses from home, simplifying follow-ups and decision-making.
3. **Insurers**: Help reduce claims through proactive health interventions.
4. **Clinical Trials**: Generate real-world evidence that can streamline clinical trials while driving down costs.

**Impact**  
The feedback from users highlights the platform's efficacy:
- Caregivers appreciate the symptom-tracking capabilities, which help save time and enhance peace of mind.
- Doctors report improved patient follow-up and engagement thanks to the tools provided by Zealth.

**Conclusion**  
With the pressing need for efficient post-discharge monitoring of cancer patients, Zealth is tackling a critical healthcare challenge head-on. They provide not just a service, but a lifeline that empowers patients and eases the burdens on the healthcare system.

For more information, you can visit their website at [Zealth](https://zealth-ai.com).
